name: Collect Craft
description:
In this game you will have to survive in a small world where you will hunt in the morning and you will be at night. Your task is to explore the world and find the key to the boss maze. In this world, you have to both be friends and betray. but the buddha is careful because in 10 days winter will come and it will already be a difficult survival. In the game, you kill everyone with one blow,

as well as you. To resurrect, go to the upper left corner of the underworld, the back pass will cost 3 crystals, but each time the price will increase by 1.
